content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”About Course” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]User Experience Design, User Interface, Design Thinking, Strategy, Figma, wireframe, Mockups, prototypes.
The UI, “User Interface” is the graphical layout of an application. UI designers create the look and feel of an application’s user interface including screen layout, transitions, interface animations, and every single micro-interaction. The UX, “User Experience” of the app is determined by how easy or difficult it is to interact with the user interface elements that the UI designers have created. User interface and user experience design are in great demand and are applicable across products and industry domains. With customer experience being the centerfold of product marketing, companies are focussing on enhancing the interface that their customers have access to. By ideating the branding, design, utilization, and function of the product, UX designers set the tone of the user experience. It is about creating a product that meets the need of the user and minimizes/eliminates inconsistencies and glitches.

Course Outline
Week 1: Typography

Week 2: Color Theory

Week 3: Principles oF Design

Week 4: Responsive Design

Week 5: Designing for Mobile – Android

Week 6: Designing for Mobile – IOS

Week 7: Mid-Term Projects & Assessments

Week 8: User Experience(UX) Design

Week 9: Rapid Prototyping

Week 10: Requirements Gathering & User Flows

Week 11: User & Product Testing

Week 12: Final Projects Presentation & Graduation[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Pre-requisite and Preparations” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  • A computer on which you can install software (Windows, or MacOS)
  • Willingness to learn.
  • Work hard to build a career in tech.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_btn title=”APPLY NOW” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline-registration-form%2F|title:Apply|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1572532215297{background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Details” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%2310e1bb” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Date: 17th January 2022

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Duration: 3 Months

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Time: 3 Hours / Session

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Venue: Online

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]Price: ₦300,000[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_btn title=”APPLY NOW” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline-registration-form%2F|title:Apply|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
